document.full_text: the top u.s. nuclear regulator on monday said the agency has determined that u.s. nuclear plants continue to operate safely, despite concerns raised by the nuclear crisis in japan.
document.title: u.s. nuclear regulator says u.s. reactors safe
lines_and_colors: the top u.s. nuclear regulator on monday said the agency has determined that u.s. nuclear plants continue to operate safely, despite concerns raised by the nuclear crisis in japan.
